scripts.create: npm run start && claudia create --profile claudia --region us-east-1 --api-module dist/index
scripts.update: npm run start && claudia update --profile claudia
scripts.updateProd: npm run start && claudia update --profile claudia --version production
scripts.updateNft: npm run start && claudia update --profile claudia --version nftProduction
scripts.updateDev: npm run start && claudia update --profile claudia --version testing
